can_non_owners_invite.description: Whether users who are not the owner of the folder can invite new collaborators to the folder
can_non_owners_invite.title: Can Non-Owners Invite

name.description: The optional new name for this folder
name.title: Name

parentId.description: The parent folder for this folder. Use this to move the folder or to restore it out of the trash.
parentId.title: Parent ID

can_non_owners_view_collaborators.description: Whether to restrict collaborators who are not the owner of this folder from viewing other collaborations on this folder
can_non_owners_view_collaborators.title: Can Non-Owners View Colaborators

is_collaboration_restricted_to_enterpris.description: Whether new invites to this folder are restricted to users within the enterprise. This does not affect existing collaborations.
is_collaboration_restricted_to_enterpris.title: Is Collaboration Restricted To Enterprise

description.description: The optional description of this folder
description.title: Description

vanity_name.description: Defines a custom vanity name to use in the shared link URL, for example https://app.box.com/v/my-shared-link
vanity_name.title: Vanity Name

unshared_at.description: The timestamp at which this shared link will expire
unshared_at.title: Unshared At

can_download.description: Whether the shared link allows for downloading of files
can_download.title: Can Download

password.description: The password required to access the shared link. Set the password to null to remove it.
password.title: Password

tags.description: The tags for this item. These tags are shown in the Box web app and mobile apps next to an item.
tags.title: Tags

fields.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.
fields.title: Fields

anyOf.description: The ID of folder to copy the file to. If not defined will be copied to the root folder.
anyOf.title: Parent ID

anyOf.description: ID of the parent folder that will contain the file. If not it will be uploaded to the root folder.
anyOf.title: Parent ID

anyOf.description: ID of the folder you want to create the new folder in. if not defined it will be created on the root folder.
anyOf.title: Parent ID

anyOf.description: The level of access granted
anyOf.title: Role

anyOf.description: The level of access granted
anyOf.title: Role

anyOf.description: Field ID
anyOf.title: File ID

anyOf.title: File ID

anyOf.description: The ID of the file to share
anyOf.title: File ID

recursive.description: Whether to delete a folder that is not empty by recursively deleting the folder and all of its content
recursive.title: Recursive

anyOf.description: The user's ID to share the file with
anyOf.title: User ID

anyOf.description: The user's ID to share the folder with
anyOf.title: User ID

anyOf.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
anyOf.title: Return All

anyOf.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
anyOf.title: Return All

anyOf.description: The user's email address to share the file with
anyOf.title: Email

anyOf.description: The user's email address to share the folder with
anyOf.title: Email

fileContent.description: The text content of the file
fileContent.title: File Content

anyOf.description: The ID of the folder to share
anyOf.title: Folder ID

binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field
binaryData.title: Binary File

anyOf.description: Max number of results to return
anyOf.title: Limit

anyOf.description: Max number of results to return
anyOf.title: Limit

notify.description: Whether if users should receive email notification for the action performed
notify.title: Notify

fields.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.
fields.title: Fields

can_view_path.description: Whether the invited users can see the entire parent path to the associated folder. The user will not gain privileges in any parent folder and therefore cannot see content the user is not collaborated on.
can_view_path.title: Can View Path

expires_at.description: Set the expiration date for the collaboration. At this date, the collaboration will be automatically removed from the item.
expires_at.title: Expires At

fields.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.
fields.title: Fields

access.title: Access

anyOf.description: The type of object the file will be shared with

anyOf.description: The group's ID to share the file with
anyOf.title: Group ID

anyOf.title: Group ID

anyOf.description: The string to search for. This query is matched against item names, descriptions, text content of files, and various other fields of the different item types.
anyOf.title: Query

anyOf.title: Query

version.description: An optional ID of the specific file version to copy
version.title: Version

name.description: An optional new name for the copied file
name.title: Name

fields.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.
fields.title: Fields

fields.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.
fields.title: Fields

sort.description: Returns the results ordered in descending order by date at which the item was last modified
sort.title: Sort

file_extensions.description: Limits search results to a comma-separated list of file extensions
file_extensions.title: File Extensions

size_range.description: Limits search results to items within a given file size range. File size ranges are defined as comma-separated byte sizes.
size_range.title: Size Range

direction.description: Defines the direction in which search results are ordered. Default value is DESC.
direction.title: Direction

contet_types.description: Limits search results to items with the given content types. Content types are defined as a comma-separated lists of Box recognized content types.
contet_types.title: Content Types

owner_user_ids.description: Limits search results to items owned by the given list of owners. Owners are defined as a comma-separated list of user IDs.
owner_user_ids.title: User IDs

scope.description: Limits search results to a user scope
scope.title: Scope

ancestor_folder_ids.description: Limits search results to items within the given list of folders. Folders are defined as a comma-separated lists of folder IDs.
ancestor_folder_ids.title: Folder IDs

trash_content.description: Controls if search results include the trash
trash_content.title: Trash Content
